text: Volvo V40 was a car produced by Volvo from 1995 through 2004. It was the estate version of the first generation S40. It was replaced by the V50 in 2004. In 2012 Volvo introduced a a different car also Volvo V40. It is a completely new design and it shares nothing but its name with the older V40. Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:Volvo automobiles
title: Volvo V40
